name: Quantum Adventure
description:
3d isometric  Surviving game. 

The player is lost in an unstable quantum space, you need to collect supplies to survive, make the observer make the chunk stable, and finally defeat the boss to find a way to leave this space.

Special game mechanics:

Quantum chunk

It needs to be observed by the observer or it will disappear when the player leaves this chunk. The next time the player comes to this chunk, things in the plot will change.
